articles.title: Trump will now be forced to testify after bombshell Jan 6 hearing lifts lid on Capitol riot links - The Independent

articles.content: The House 6 January select committee on Thursday voted to issue a subpoena demanding testimony from the man whose actions have been at the centre of the nine-member panels investigation over the last… [+9363 chars]

articles.description: American Music Awards 2022 will be held in Los Angeles on November 20. AMAs voting line is open till November 14.
articles.content: On Thursday, the nomination list for this year's American Music Awards was announced online and fan voting in all but one of this year's 37 categories was opened. With eight nominations, Bad Bunny is… [+5328 chars]

articles.title: Ringo Starr cancels North America tour with Covid - BBC
articles.description: The Beatle had previously cancelled dates after catching the virus, before returning to the road.
articles.content:
Sir Ringo Starr has cancelled the rest of his North American tour after testing positive to Covid-19 again.
